dc_title_s: Map of the state of Michigan from the best authorities and most recent surveys compiled & drawn by S.N. Gaston.
dc_description_s: Negative photostat. Greenwich and Washington prime meridians. Includes "description of Michigan" listings position, history, climate, internal improvements, geology and mineralogy, and animals. Includes a statistial table of Michigan. Lists surveyors and civil engineers. Shows surveyed counties. Shows major cities and towns. 1 map on six sheets ; 104 x 114 cm, sheets 52 x 38 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
